original_text: When the voice had spoken, they found that Jesus was alone. The disciples kept this to themselves and did not tell anyone at that time what they had seen.
korean_text: 소리가 그치매 오직 예수만 보이더라 제자들이 잠잠하여 그 본 것을 무엇이든지 그 때에는 아무에게도 이르지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: they found that Jesus was alone
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수님께서 혼자 계신 것을 발견했습니다

sentences.original_text: The disciples kept this to themselves
and did not tell anyone at that time
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그때는 그 누구에게도 말하지 않았습니다
